Title: Contents
Contents: You can use the Metadata Editor as a "wizard" (i.e., by proceeding through the sections in sequence, filling out the metadata as you go), or you can click on any of the links under Contents to jump directly to that section of the metadata.

Title: Navigating in the Metadata Editor
Contents:
The Save and Continue button saves the changes you've made on the current page and moves you ahead to the next page. You can step through the pages sequentially using Save and Continue, or you can click any of the links under Contents in the left margin to jump directly to a particular section of the metadata.

The Reset button clears the changes you've made on the current page and leaves you on that page.

Please refrain from using your browser's forward and back buttons. Using them may cause you to lose some of your edits.
